alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; St. Landry; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 01 at 2:40PM CDT until November 02 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Vernon, Rapides and Avoyelles Parishes. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 8 AM CDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 8 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
